scripts.save-test-output: cp --recursive ../main/prisma ./prisma && docker compose up -d && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest run --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts --no-color --reporter verbose --silent > test-output.txt && docker stop tests-db-1 && rm -fr ./prisma
scripts.test: cp --recursive ../main/prisma ./prisma && docker compose up -d && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts && docker stop tests-db-1 && rm -fr ./prisma
scripts.test-once-on-ci: cp --recursive ../main/prisma ./prisma && prisma migrate dev --name init --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ../tests/prisma/schema.prisma && vitest run --config ./vitest.config.integration.ts && rm -fr ./prisma
